description: A legendary shipbuilding company in Water 7 led by Tom, the world's best shipwright. Tom's Workers was responsible for building Gol D. Roger's ship, the Oro Jackson, and the Sea Train. The company disbanded after Tom's arrest.

keyMoments.title: Sea Train Completion Celebration
keyMoments.description: Tom's Workers celebrates the successful completion of the Sea Train Puffing Tom, their greatest achievement that was meant to earn Tom a pardon.
keyMoments.significance: Represents the peak of Tom's Workers' success before the conspiracy that destroyed them.

keyMoments.title: Pluton Blueprints Revealed Within Company
keyMoments.description: Tom reveals the Pluton blueprints to his apprentices Iceburg and Franky at Tom's Workers headquarters.
keyMoments.significance: Shows that Tom's Workers held one of the most dangerous secrets in the world.
keyMoments.quote: It would be a nightmare if Pluton is built.

statusHistory.reason: Operating as shipbuilding company under Tom's leadership
Disbanded after Tom's arrest and execution

members.note: Arrested and executed by World Government
Continued as station master after company disbanded

achievements.achievement: Built the Oro Jackson, Gol D. Roger's ship
achievements.significance: Created the ship that carried the Pirate King to Laugh Tale

achievements.achievement: Completed the Sea Train Puffing Tom
achievements.significance: Revolutionary transportation system that saved Water 7's economy

achievements.achievement: Guarded the Pluton blueprints for generations
achievements.significance: Protected one of the world's most dangerous secrets

description: Cipher Pol Number 5, one of the World Government's intelligence agencies. Led by Spandam during the time of Tom's trial, CP5 was tasked with obtaining the Pluton blueprints.

keyMoments.title: CP5 Chief Spandam Arrives at Water 7
keyMoments.description: Spandam, as chief of CP5, arrives at Water 7 to pursue the Pluton blueprints from Tom.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces the World Government intelligence agency responsible for Tom's downfall.
keyMoments.quote: I've been researching the history of Water 7 for a long time.

keyMoments.title: CP5 Receives Orders from Five Elders
keyMoments.description: Spandam and CP5 receive direct authorization from the Five Elders to pursue ancient weapons under the guise of combating piracy.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals the high-level World Government involvement in the search for ancient weapons.

keyMoments.title: CP5 Orchestrates Conspiracy Against Tom
keyMoments.description: Unable to obtain the blueprints legally, CP5 under Spandam's leadership orchestrates a plot to frame Tom using Franky's battleships.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates CP5's willingness to use illegal methods and frame innocent people.

members.note: Led CP5 during Tom's trial, later promoted to CP9
